title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:

**Say Goodbye to Pesky Flies with Catchmaster's Giant Fly Glue Traps!**

Are you tired of buzzing intruders disrupting your home or business? Look no further! The Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster is your ultimate solution, expertly designed to tackle even the most challenging infestations. With a pack of three, each extending a generous 30 feet, you're fully armed to reclaim your space from pesky pests.

**Features:**

- **Pre-baited Convenience**: Each trap comes ready to use, pre-baited with a powerful scent attractant that draws flies in, so you don't have to deal with messy baits or complicated set-ups.
- **Versatile Use**: Whether indoors or outdoors, these traps are primed for action. Suitable for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms, no fly is safe regardless of where they hide.
- **Eco-Friendly and Safe**: Crafted from non-toxic materials, the green barn paper sheets offer a disposable, environmentally conscious way to manage pests without harming your family, pets, or livestock.
- **Long-Lasting Protection**: Designed to endure up to a full year under normal conditions, these sticky adhesive traps provide long-term defense, ensuring your environment stays fly-free.
- **Massive Coverage**: Boasting an impressive 3600 square inches of coverage per pack, these traps ensure a broad defense perimeter, capturing flies by the multitude.
- **Intelligent Pest Management**: Embrace a smart approach to pest control with Catchmaster's scientifically developed traps, field-tested to deliver results in damp, humid, and regular conditions.

**Why Choose Catchmaster?**

Our Giant Fly Glue Traps are not just effective; they're a testament to intelligent pest management. With a scented formula that's irresistible to flies and a sticky adhesive that ensures they stay put, you can rest easy knowing that your fly troubles are over.

Enjoy a clean, fly-free environment as you deploy these green warriors where other methods are not suitable. Their discreet design allows for seamless integration into your space without the unsightly appearance of traditional traps.

Don't let flies take over your space. Trust in the strength and reliability of Catchmaster's Giant Fly Glue Traps and join the ranks of satisfied customers who've turned their fly frustrations into a thing of the past. Order now and experience the peace of mind that comes with a fly-free environment!

**Say Goodbye to Buzzing Annoyances with Catchmaster's Giant Fly Glue Trap!**

Are you tired of swatting flies and dealing with pesky insects that invade your space? The solution is here! Introducing the **Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster**, the ultimate defender in your fight against fly infestations. Our special pack of 3 glue traps, each stretching to an impressive 30 feet, is your steadfast ally in reclaiming your indoor and outdoor areas from unwelcome winged guests.

**Key Features:**

- **Pre-Baited Convenience**: Each trap comes pre-baited, ready to deploy straight out of the box. No mess, no fuss ‚Äì just unwrap and let the trap do the work.
- **Indoor & Outdoor Flexibility**: Whether you're protecting your home, commercial space, or agricultural areas, these traps are designed for both indoor and outdoor use, versatile enough to adapt to where you need them most.
- **Eco-Friendly Approach**: With a commitment to safety, our traps are non-toxic, making them a responsible choice for households and businesses alike. Safeguard your space without harming the environment.
- **Long-Lasting Defense**: Built to last, each trap maintains its effectiveness for up to a full year under normal conditions, ensuring you get the most bang for your buck.
- **Massive Coverage**: With a combined surface area of 3,600 square inches, there's more than enough sticky real estate to catch flies by the battalion.
- **Intelligent Pest Management**: Our traps aren't just a temporary fix; they're part of a smart pest management strategy designed to keep infestations at bay.
- **Aesthetic & Discreet**: The traps come in a natural green color, blending seamlessly into your environment while remaining a deadly stop for flies.
- **Easy Disposal**: Once full, simply dispose of the trap and replace it with a fresh one. No cleaning required!

Specially crafted for a variety of locations, from residential kitchens to industrial waste rooms, these traps are field-tested and proven to stand up to damp, humid, and everyday conditions. They're also scented to lure insects in, ensuring maximum catch rates.

Don't let flies take over your valuable space. Invest in the **Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster** and enjoy a peaceful, bug-free environment. Purchase your pack today and experience the difference intelligent pest management can make!
